FAVICON PLACEHOLDER

To add a favicon to your site:

1. Create a favicon.svg file (or use a PNG/ICO file)
2. Place it in the /public folder
3. The index.html already references /favicon.svg

Quick favicon generators:
- https://favicon.io
- https://realfavicongenerator.net
- Figma (export as SVG)

Recommended formats:
- SVG (modern, scalable)
- PNG (32x32, 180x180 for mobile)
- ICO (legacy support)

For now, browsers will show a default favicon icon.
